name: thedailybeast
text:
Night 1 of the #DemConvention is in the books.

name: thedailybeast
text:
When it came to former First Lady Michelle Obama’s address on the first night of the #DemConvention, Fox News commentators couldn’t come up with a single criticism. 

"She really flayed, sliced and diced Donald Trump," said host Chris Wallace. https://t.co/OHBub73rag

text: Stephen Colbert on Michelle Obama's DNC speech: “I’ll be honest with you. My job is to have a joke for every time somebody says anything in public. After watching Michelle Obama’s speech, I have never been more happy to fail at my job.” https://t.co/x058rIoehR

name: thedailybeast
text: RT @MarlowNYC: Stephen Colbert: "This feels like this is the real beginning of the election. A chance for the American people to do the work that our elected officials failed to do for the past four years. And that’s hold Donald Trump accountable." https://t.co/uYyXIE4Ut8 https://t.co/daPjHSebAC

name: thedailybeast
text: Night One of the DNC was a little weird, but so is life in America right now. It worked, writes @mtomasky https://t.co/9NFSzkaYin

name: thedailybeast
text: Michelle Obama went after Trump in a way that was both eloquent and frank, relatable and empathic—all while showing how the current president lacks all of those traits, writes @kalihollowayftw https://t.co/x5aNYPeHsp
